channel.title: Whonix Gateway eth0 static ip
channel.description:
Hello guys, I just tried to change the IP of eth0 to use an internal network instead of NAT. Here is the tutorial i used: https://danielmiessler.com/study/manually-set-ip-linux/
My settings on the Gateway: IP Address: 192.168.0.2 Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.0 Default Gateway: 192.168.0.1 DNS: 192.168.0.1
My settings on the other OS, which should share the internet connection: IP Address: 192.168.0.1 Subnet: 255.255.255.0
To find these settings I watched this tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z3KhO9-hbWQ
After I changed the settings the Workspace disconnected from the Internet. Can someone help me out?
My gole is to have an OS as an pre-gateway.
